entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story, introduced as he squeezes inside a shop.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character in the story, mentioned alongside Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character in the story, introduced as she squeezes inside a shop with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: gilderoy lockhart
entities.description: Gilderoy Lockhart is a wizard who is signing his books at the shop, described as wearing robes of forget-me-not blue that match his eyes.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as standing in line with her husband and the rest of the Weasleys, greeting Harry and Ron.

entities.name: mr granger
entities.description: Mr Granger is mentioned as standing in line with his wife and the rest of the Weasleys.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are a family of wizards who are standing in line to see Gilderoy Lockhart.

entities.name: banshee
entities.description: Break with a Banshee is a book written by Gilderoy Lockhart that Harry and Ron grab from the shelf.

relationships.description: Harry sees Gilderoy Lockhart signing his books at the shop.
Ron also sees Gilderoy Lockhart signing his books at the shop.
Hermione sees Gilderoy Lockhart signing his books at the shop.
Harry reads Break with a Banshee, one of Gilderoy Lockhart's books.
